alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 4:13AM EDT until March 23 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation, primarily snow and sleet this morning. Light freezing rain and rain will mix in this afternoon. Additional snow and sleet accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Eastern Upper Michigan. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
